prompts: Create a grass-type Pokemon that resembles a goat and has a green hoodie.
Imagine a Pokemon with brown and green fur, perfect for climbing mountains.
Generate a Pokemon that can blend into forest habitats with its earthy colors.
Show me a Pokemon that has a playful personality and loves to roam grasslands.
Design a sturdy quadruped Pokemon with distinctive horns and a sporty look.
Give me a Pokemon that embodies agility and strength, with a unique coat pattern.
Make a Pokemon that is friendly and approachable, perfect for urban settings.
